compat-change.description:
Requires an app registers a {@link Callback} before invoking {@link #createVirtualDisplay(String, int, int, int, int, Surface, VirtualDisplay.Callback, Handler) createVirtualDisplay}.

Enabled after version 33 (Android T), so applies to target SDK of 34+ (Android U+).
compat-change.name: MEDIA_PROJECTION_REQUIRES_CALLBACK
